text: The 1886 New York Giants season was the franchise's 4th season. The team had a record of 75–44, finishing third in the National League, 12.5 games behind the Chicago White Stockings. == Regular season == Opening Day photo, Boston Beaneaters and New York Giants === Season standings === === Record vs. opponents === === Roster === {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !
